title:
Stimulated X-ray Raman scattering for selective preparation of dark
  states bypassing optical selection rules
authors:
Francesco Montorsi, Shaul Mukamel, Filippo Tamassia, Marco Garavelli,
  Francesco Segatta, Artur Nenov
abstract:
We present an X-ray based stimulated Raman approach to control the
preparation of optically dark electronic states in generic molecular systems.
Leveraging on the unique properties of core-level excited states, we
demonstrate that optically forbidden transitions between singlet states, or
between singlet and triplet states are made accessible. Two molecular systems
are studied as a test-bed of the proposed approach, and its experimental
feasibility is eventually discussed.
